00091 template <typename AttributeImpl>
00092 bool CAttributedObject::RegisterAttributeType()
00093 {
00094        return s_attributesFactory.RegisterFactory(new istd::TSingleFactory<iser::IObject, AttributeImpl>(AttributeImpl::GetTypeName()), true);
00095 }
